nodes.text: Gorvo was the pet rancor of the Dathomiri Witch Nandina from the Nightsisters Clan. He was as fierce as his mistress and would defend her to the death.
Gorvo appeared in the video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game developed by Sony and published by LucasArts. The game shut down on December 15, 2011.
